CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, November 4, 1950, p. 11, reads: "LOVELY BRIDE . . .Mr. and Mrs. Jesse J. Elliot of 7082 Apple Avenue, announced the marriage of their granddaughter, Eloise Jean Carter, to Frank Henderson of 6433 Dean Street, Saturday evening, Oct. 28, at Sixth Mount Zion Baptist Church. The Rev. J. C. Hairston performed the rites. The reception immediately followed the ceremony at 7604 Mulford Street. Attendants were Mrs. Elsa Harris, matron of honor; Misses Shirley Henderson and Dorothy Vinson, Roy Henderson, best man: Mac Henderson and Bill McKinney."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of bride Eloise Jean Carter Henderson wearing gown with lace overlay, necklace of two strands of pearls or beads, and long lace veil, seated on arm of sofa, in domestic interior with floral curtains, horizontal version
